mapper.select:
select
from sg_salary_grant_sub_task t
and t.salary_grant_main_task_code = #{taskCode}
and t.is_active=1
order by t.grant_mode,t.salary_grant_sub_task_id

select
from sg_salary_grant_sub_task t where t.salary_grant_sub_task_code = #{taskCode} and t.is_active=1 order by t.salary_grant_sub_task_id

from sg_salary_grant_main_task m,sg_salary_grant_sub_task s where m.salary_grant_main_task_code = s.salary_grant_main_task_code and m.salary_grant_main_task_code = #{taskCode} and m.is_active = 1 and s.grant_mode = 1 and s.is_active = 1

select
from sg_salary_grant_sub_task t where t.salary_grant_sub_task_code in (${taskCodes}) and t.task_type = 1 and t.is_active = 1 and t.task_status != '7'
